definition: board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: Physiological diseases and microbial infection make Chinese chestnut putrid.
sentences.chinese: 板栗腐爛由生理病變和微生物侵染所致。

sentences.english: The main nutritional components of Xingtai chestnut was analyzed with chemical analysis method.
sentences.chinese: 採用化學分析法，分析了邢臺板栗的主要營養成分。

sentences.english: Basilisks' hides range from dark chestnut shades of brown to mossy green and ocean blue.
sentences.chinese: 蜥怪的皮從暗板栗色，暗棕色，到苔蘚綠與海藍都有。

sentences.english: The chestnut trees begin to bear fruit.
sentences.chinese: 這些板栗樹開始結果了。

sentences.english: Planted 300 acres of apple orchard and 500 acres of fine chestnut base.
sentences.chinese: 種植了300畝精品蘋果園和500畝板栗基地。

sentences.english: Good quality chestnut Qianxi but aroused the concern of the people of the world.
sentences.chinese: 品質優良的遷西板栗更引起了世人的關注。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the main pest disease of Chestnut in Kunming district.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了昆明地區板栗的主要病蟲害。

sentences.english: Based on the practice of chestnut production, it is very exigent and significant to intensify the soil management of chestnut forest.
sentences.chinese: 針對板栗生產實際情況，加強慄林土壤管理非常迫切。

sentences.english: This experiment mainly explores the cause of putridity and the antiseptic and fresh-keeping technique.
sentences.chinese: 研究了由病理引起板栗腐爛的原因及防腐保鮮方法。

sentences.english: Blend the cooked chestnut kernels until perfectly smooth.
sentences.chinese: 熟板栗攪打至非常勻滑。

sentences.english: And this can be basis for further analyse the genetic characteristic of chestnut.
sentences.chinese: 爲今後進一步研究板栗的其他遺傳性狀奠定了基礎。

sentences.english: The species of scarabs attacking chestnuts were investigated in Hexi Forest Farm, Jingning County.
sentences.chinese: 景寧縣鶴溪林場板栗林遭金龜子危害嚴重。

sentences.english: The core collection of germplasm of Castanea mollissima BL.
sentences.chinese: 構建燕山板栗實生居羣核心種質庫。

sentences.english: It is said that the remaining chestnut trees are all offsprings of this tree. Hence, the name of "Chestnut Ancestor".
sentences.chinese: 據說鐵橛山裏的板栗均由此繁生，故名“慄祖”。

sentences.english: A new type of Chinese chestnut sorting system by machine vision was designed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一種基於機器視覺的板栗實時分級系統。

sentences.english: This is how it is chestnut?
